name: Save the City
summary: Each of us would like to drive an ambulance at least once in a lifetime ... In real life it is not so easy to do, but in this game, you can safely travel around the city and provide the people caught in accidents with medical care! You can earn money by performing routine mission in the game, and the "non-stop" where you gain bonuses for the damages caused to other road users. Collect the right amount of money, and buy a new, powerful car! Good luck!
